faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common inquiries
faq.mainDescription: Find answers to questions you may have about AquaLingua here.

items.question: How does AquaLingua work?
items.answer: AquaLingua is an application that turns your word learning process into a fun game. With each word you learn, you feed the fish in your aquarium and earn new fish. You can reinforce your word learning with various activities such as flashcards, quizzes, writing, and word matching.

items.question: Which languages can I use AquaLingua for?
items.answer: We currently support English, German, Spanish, and Turkish. More languages will be added soon.

items.question: What are the membership fees?
items.answer: You can try AquaLingua for free for 7 days. After the trial period, you can upgrade to premium membership by paying $9.99 per month or $79.99 per year (equivalent to $6.67 per month).

items.question: How can I track my learning progress?
items.answer: From the statistics section in the app, you can track the number of words you've learned, words you don't know, and how many days you've been actively using the app. You can also see your progress in your word lists.

items.question: Can I create my own word list?
items.answer: We don't yet support the word list creation feature. But in future versions, you'll be able to create your own word lists in the app and add the words you want to these lists. You'll also be able to create your own custom lists by selecting words from existing lists.

items.question: Can I use the app without an internet connection?
items.answer: Yes, you can use word lists you've previously downloaded without an internet connection. However, an internet connection is required to download new word lists and synchronize your progress.
